setCustomAudioCueMap(Map<AbsSpeechRecognizer.AudioCueState, List<Integer>>) - 类 中的方法com.azero.sdk.Config
设置自定义的音频提示语 (音频文件长度建议控制在2秒,避免过程影响拾音) 示例代码: Map> customAudioCueMap = new HashMap<>(); ArrayList ids = new ArrayList<>();//多个应答语,随机播放 ids.add(R.raw.xxx); customAudioCueMap.put(AbsSpeechRecognizer.AudioCueState.START_TOUCH, ids); customAudioCueMap.put(AbsSpeechRecognizer.AudioCueState.START_VOICE, ids); ArrayList endIds = new ArrayList<>(); endIds.add(R.raw.xxx); customAudioCueMap.put(AbsSpeechRecognizer.AudioCueState.END, endIds); config.setCustomAudioCueMap(customAudioCueMap); 说明: public static enum AudioCueState { START_TOUCH,//按键开始拾音 START_VOICE,//语言唤醒开始拾音 END;//语言唤醒结束拾音 private AudioCueState() { } }
